event.title: "Secure/Zensur Boot: Wer kontrolliert den Computer?", Berlin, Germany
event.body: Today, on 17 January 2012, Matthias Kirschner gives a talk about "Secure/Zensur Boot: Wer kontrolliert den Computer?". The presentation takes place in the c-base, Berlin, and is part of the "Netzpolitische Abend", hosted by the Digitale Gesellschaft, an interest organisation concerned about internet politics and pro digital civil rights. The speech is in German. Admission is free.
